Remember, no rush! Save a picture of your progress to your profile ;-)
Above you have printable materials for this task :-*
The task is to spell all the capital letters to develop muscle memory.\nYou need to outline/write all the letters following the pattern shown on the sheet.
The task is to spell all the lower case letters.\nYou should outline/write all the letters following the pattern shown on the sheet.
The task is to write capital letters yourself.\nYou should write all the letters, but now there is no pattern visible on the sheet.
The task is to write the small letters yourself.\nYou should write all the letters, but now there is no pattern visible on the sheet.
The task is to spell out the numbers.\nYou have to draw/write all the digits following the pattern shown on the sheet.
The task is to write the numbers yourself.\nYou have to write the digits, but now there is no pattern visible on the sheet.
You already know what you can and cannot do. Think through all your weaknesses and redo the tasks.
The task is to write a whole sentence.\nThink of a text, maybe from your favourite book, and try to write this text with your left hand.
Congratulations!\nIf you are already on the ninth exercise, you have learned to write with your left hand.
